The Caldwell Civic Center
The Caldwell Civic Center

Why the Caldwell Civic Center ?

Selecting the appropriate event center is vital for your event to be a success. The Caldwell Civic Center offers a versatile space suitable for a variety of celebrations. We cater to various event types including:

* Corporate/Business Events
* Weddings
* Anniversaries and Birthdays
* Quinceaneras
* Holiday parties
* Reunions
* Anything you want to celebrate

**Contact us to book your next event!**

Contact Us:

Ready to start planning your event at the Caldwell Civic Center? We are here to help you every step of the way. Contact us to discuss your event details and schedule a tour of our center.   
  
To schedule:  
\* **Call:** (979) 567-3271 ext. 700   
\* ***Email:***[*civiccenter@caldwelltx.gov*](javascript:;)  
\* **Visit:** Monday-Friday 10am-4pm; CLOSED Wednesdays

Caldwell Civic Center  
103 W TX-HWY 21  
Caldwell, Texas 77836

Civic Center Fees and Prices

Contents

CIVIC CENTER FEES\_FY24-25

Civic Center Floorplan

Whether you are hosting a small business meeting or a large social affair, our 6,430 square foot facility with flexible room configurations, is sure to fit your space requirements. Specialty shops, museums, historic sites, local restaurants, and recreation activities await those visiting the Civic Center and "Downtown Caldwell."

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
